about_the_game:
Junkienator is a first-person thriller/narrative adventure game that will take you on a journey through the messy and disastrous offices. Paper on the floor, bananas on the desks, your job is to clean it all up. Use your unique ability to sniff out rubbish, solve puzzles and uncover dark secrets from your past.

Explore the offices

Who hasn't dreamed of wandering through empty offices just to clean them up? Look at the number of PCs! How many desks! What about those folders?


Vacuum and throw objects

Cleaning doesn't have to be boring! Use your tool to throw things around the rooms, it's awesome! Throw the monitor at the desk, knock over the cabinets, take advantage of the game engine's physics, and while you're at it, get rid of those weird black creatures. Nobody will complain, at least not until tomorrow...


Solve puzzles to enter certain areas

Sometimes the staff can be forgetful and leave doors locked. Don't let them stop you! Solve puzzles to open doors, replace fuses that have fallen to the floor, enter ventilation ducts when you really need to, nothing can stop you!


Use your innate skills

You are a professional guardian, and as such you have a flair for waste, in every sense of the word! You are so good that you can smell rubbish from a distance! Make use of it!




So grab your janitor's toolkit and prepare to embark on a thrilling and mysterious journey through the offices in Junkienator. Are you ready to clean up the mess and face the horrors that lie behind it?

content_descriptors.notes: This videogame may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Violence, Blood, General Mature Content. Player discretion is advised.

name: Junkienator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 (we're still testing)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Step into a janitor's shoes in this thrilling adventure! Clean the offices, solve puzzles and uncover dark secrets about your past. Want to throw those office plants? Do it! Have fun, but beware, something's wrong when you're at home.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support
